title: Mercedes : market share of new car registrations in the EU 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
Month Sep 18 has the highest Market share and Aug 18 has the lowest Market share.
The highest Month Sep 18 has 2.6 more Market share than the lowest Month Aug 18.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 7.2 is found at Month Sep 18 and the minimum is found at Aug 18 where Market share is 4.6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
Month Sep 18 has the highest Market share and Aug 18 has the lowest Market share.
The highest Month Sep 18 has 2.6 more Market share than the lowest Month Aug 18.
max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
Month Sep 18 has the highest Market share and Aug 18 has the lowest Market share.
Second maximum Market share is found at Month .
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 2.6.
Market share at Month Sep 18 is 7.2 , second place is  at 5.9, and thirdly is Oct 18 at 6.8.
Over the past 17 Months, the Market share has lowered.
Month May 19, Feb 19, and Jan 19 share the same value 5.3.
The Month Aug 18 has 1.23 times less Market share than average.
The Market share is 99.5 if we add up values of all Months.
